LABEL: 0x35F
STRING: After my morning routines, I left the house early.

LABEL: 0x3B4
STRING: I'm gonna have to talk to that girl again today.

LABEL: 0x405
STRING: ...Then I'm gonna pat her on her head until her neatly tied hair is all messed up!

LABEL: 0x47A
STRING: I arrived at the school in high spirits, but I couldn't find Sycoe at the usual flower bed.

LABEL: 0x526
STRING: Sycoe... didn't come to school today?

LABEL: 0x56F
STRING: I was somewhat out of sorts, so I dejectedly trotted off to class.

LABEL: 0x61C
STRING: Suddenly, during class, a bad feeling came over me.

LABEL: 0x673
STRING: ...Don't tell me she's avoiding me on purpose?

LABEL: 0x6D2
STRING: If that's the case, I'm quite shocked. I was pretty confident that she liked me.

LABEL: 0x74B
STRING: No, she might just be resting today. I bet she is... right? That must be all...

LABEL: 0x7C8
STRING: It's not like we're lovers, we're barely even friends.

LABEL: 0x81B
STRING: I used to not care about others very much.

LABEL: 0x878
STRING: Now it's the opposite, I can't help but be worried for Sycoe.

LABEL: 0x9B4
STRING: ...Is it because she's cute?

LABEL: 0x9F9
STRING: Or because if I helped her I might get something in return...?

LABEL: 0xA5A
STRING: ...Is it because I'm playing God?

LABEL: 0xAE6
STRING: ...am I acting cool to boost my ego, by trying to help that poor girl?

LABEL: 0xB5B
STRING: I shook my head fervently. I've got to get those weird ideas out of my head...

LABEL: 0xC0F
STRING: ─It's finally lunchtime.

LABEL: 0xC58
STRING: Time seems to go more slowly when that girl's not around.

LABEL: 0xCBD
STRING: I was curious and asked the person in the next class about Sycoe, and they said she often missed classes.

LABEL: 0xD2C
STRING: ...I see, so it's just one of those days, is it?

LABEL: 0xD77
STRING: They said they didn't know why she took the day off today, so I didn't get to know the details... but just knowing that was a big help.

LABEL: 0xEA7
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xEB5
STRING: "...Looks like Sycoe-chan took the day off? I heard from the guy next door."

LABEL: 0xFB1
STRING: Yukimaru calls out to me in his usual tone of voice.

LABEL: 0xFFD
STRING: He was still as smug and snobby as ever. He put his weight against the wall.

LABEL: 0x113C
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x114A
STRING: "...So you don't know either, huh. I thought you might have heard something from the person herself."

LABEL: 0x1256
STRING: Hmph. What the hell man... don't talk like you know more than I do. I'm a little peeved.

LABEL: 0x1373
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1381
STRING: "Did you know that there was a fire near the Usatoria yesterday?"

LABEL: 0x147B
STRING: Ah, come to think of it... the guys in my class were talking about that rumour this morning.

LABEL: 0x14F2
STRING: As I recall, a fire broke out on the ground floor of a wooden apartment building or something like that...

LABEL: 0x15F7
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1605
STRING: "I only heard about it from others, so I don't know if it's true or not..."

LABEL: 0x17B4
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x17C2
STRING: "But they're saying that it was Sycoe's place that burned down."

LABEL: 0x18A6
STRING: As soon as I heard those words, my brain stopped thinking for a moment.

LABEL: 0x196B
STRING: Wha... What the hell...!?

LABEL: 0x1A31
STRING: Before I could even start thinking, I was already running out of the classroom.

LABEL: 0x1A8E
STRING: I have to confirm it...! That's the only thing driving me right now.

LABEL: 0x1AF7
STRING: Thinking about it, I could have made a phone call, but somehow my body acted first before my head...

LABEL: 0x1BB4
STRING: It took me several tens of minutes to get there, and the place was swarming with onlookers.

LABEL: 0x1C13
STRING: The apartment where Sycoe lived had been cruelly burned down to a crisp...

LABEL: 0x1C7E
STRING: In such a condition, people can't live there anymore.

LABEL: 0x1CD3
STRING: Hey, what happened? Sycoe... where's Sycoe? Is she alive? Or...

LABEL: 0x1D40
STRING: With trembling hands, I pulled out my phone and called her.

LABEL: 0x1DB3
STRING: Ring ring ring...

LABEL: 0x1E0A
STRING: Ring ring ring...

LABEL: 0x1E69
STRING: "The number you have dialed is not available right now."

LABEL: 0x1ECC
STRING: My chest is filled with a sense of despair and helplessness, and my phone slipped out of my hand.

LABEL: 0x1F55
STRING: The phone fell to the ground, and the screen cracked a little.

LABEL: 0x1FC2
STRING: I couldn't connect... don't tell me, she really is...?

LABEL: 0x200F
STRING: Why...!? Isn't this too much...?

LABEL: 0x206E
STRING: I couldn't confirm her safety, and then several days passed by in a blur.

LABEL: 0x2357
STRING: ─A few days since then.

LABEL: 0x23A2
STRING: After class, I left the school and headed straight home.

LABEL: 0x2403
STRING: Ever since I lost Sycoe, I couldn't get in the mood to do anything, I couldn't calm down.

LABEL: 0x2478
STRING: Even though Nana and Yukimaru invited me to play, I didn't feel like it, so I turned them down.

LABEL: 0x24F3
STRING: ...On a dimly lit road.

LABEL: 0x2530
STRING: Gazing at my shadow cast by the setting sun, I continued step by step.

LABEL: 0x2597
STRING: I bumped into a stranger and almost fell over, but that didn't matter.

LABEL: 0x25F6
STRING: There was a gust of wind, and then I looked up.

LABEL: 0x2686
STRING: I couldn't believe my eyes when I spotted a familiar girl across the road.

LABEL: 0x26FB
STRING: Sycoe...?!

LABEL: 0x27C7
STRING: The girl had a blank expression on her face, she was hunched over and trudging along.

LABEL: 0x2830
STRING: I hadn't seen her for a few days, so not much should have changed, but there was something decidedly different about her.

LABEL: 0x28A2
STRING: She was dressed from head to toe in black mourning clothes.

LABEL: 0x2935
STRING: I quickly ran over to her and without thinking, hugged her body with my two hands.

LABEL: 0x2A36
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2A44
STRING: "A-Ah... It hurts, Metarou-kun..."

LABEL: 0x2B27
STRING: I was worried about you...! I really thought you were dead, and I...

LABEL: 0x2B92
STRING: As I said it, I felt like my tears were about to overflow.

LABEL: 0x2C8B
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2C99
STRING: "I'm sorry... b-but we had a promise. You shouldn't come near Sycoe again, right?"

LABEL: 0x2D9C
STRING: I won't recognize that. I don't remember making any promises like that.

LABEL: 0x2E0D
STRING: I glared at her strongly, and she gave me an uneasy look.

LABEL: 0x2F10
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2F1E
STRING: "Fueh...! A-are you angry...?"

LABEL: 0x3097
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x30A5
STRING: "...Me too, I wanted to see you as well."

LABEL: 0x3232
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3240
STRING: "But Nana..."

LABEL: 0x3311
STRING: ...Nana?

LABEL: 0x3348
STRING: Why's her name brought up? She's not related to this, is she?

LABEL: 0x3457
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3465
STRING: "She told me not to see Metarou-kun anymore... So, I can't meet you anymore..."

LABEL: 0x35B2
STRING: At that moment, my hands were shaking with anger.

LABEL: 0x3609
STRING: I couldn't even find the words anymore. Unforgivable... Simply unforgivable.

LABEL: 0x366C
STRING: ...Look. I'll choose for myself who I'll get involved with. Not Nana! Me!

LABEL: 0x36DD
STRING: When I told her that, she gave a small nod, her eyes tearing up.

LABEL: 0x3742
STRING: ...That being said, why was Sycoe wearing mourning clothes?

LABEL: 0x379C
STRING: D-don't tell me...

LIST.STRING: Are you sending those two people off?

LABEL: 0x38C1
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x38CF
STRING: "Mom and Dad got caught in a fire... and..."

LABEL: 0x3A66
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3A74
STRING: "It's my... fault!"

LABEL: 0x3BED
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3BFB
STRING: "Metarou-kun, what should I do? ...I'll cause trouble for people just by being alive."

LABEL: 0x3D00
STRING: Tears started to well up in Sycoe's eyes.

LABEL: 0x3DF5
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3E03
STRING: "It would be better if I wasn't around..."

LABEL: 0x4218
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4226
STRING: "It would be better if I died instead...!!!!"

LABEL: 0x4311
STRING: Don't say such ominous things!

LABEL: 0x4358
STRING: There's no such thing as being cursed with bad luck, and I don't believe in superstitions.

LABEL: 0x445D
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x446B
STRING: "No one would be sad if I died anyway..."

LABEL: 0x455A
STRING: Even after hearing my passionate words, she remained depressed.

LABEL: 0x465B
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4669
STRING: "Hey, if... I'm dead..."

LABEL: 0x47E2
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x47F0
STRING: "Will Metarou-kun... be sad...?"

LABEL: 0x4971
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x497F
STRING: "Will you cry for my sake...?"

LABEL: 0x4A5E
STRING: Blood pours out of Sycoe's mouth.

LABEL: 0x4B51
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4B5F
STRING: "Cough... Hey, I... Metarou-kun..."

LABEL: 0x4C4C
STRING: I didn't even realize it at the time.

LABEL: 0x4D45
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4D53
STRING: "I... love y...."

LABEL: 0x4E20
STRING: I never thought that would be her last words.

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: BAD END「Suicide by Poison」

LABEL: 0x51C8
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x51D6
STRING: "Yeah... It's my mom and dad's funeral today."

LABEL: 0x52D1
STRING: With a vacant expression on her face, Sycoe looked down at the ground.

LABEL: 0x5322
STRING: Her parents died in the fire. And only Sycoe was saved...

LABEL: 0x53A5
STRING: Was this also the doing of her misfortune? The power of misfortune that engulfs those around her...

LABEL: 0x5418
STRING: If you look closely, I could see that Sycoe's cheeks seemed to be gaunter than before.

LABEL: 0x5481
STRING: I can't say anything...

LABEL: 0x54C0
STRING: I just watched her in silence.

LABEL: 0x5507
STRING: I'm sure that my cliched words can't describe her suffering.

LABEL: 0x5634
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5642
STRING: "I-I know you're... worried about me, so thank you. ...But, I'll be fine."

LABEL: 0x5745
STRING: Seeing the worried look on my face, she loosened her mouth into a grin.

LABEL: 0x57AE
STRING: She might think she's laughing like she always does, but I can tell she's pushing herself.

LABEL: 0x58BF
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x58CD
STRING: "I've always been like this, so... ahahaha. I don't know why, but this seems normal to me now."

LABEL: 0x59E0
STRING: There's no way you're okay. It would be crazy to lose your parents and be okay with it.

LIST.STRING: You don't need force yourself with me.
You don't look okay at all.

LABEL: 0x5B49
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5B57
STRING: "...Ah... no way."

LABEL: 0x5C28
STRING: She made an expression as if she got caught lying.

LABEL: 0x5D1D
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5D2B
STRING: "This is why... this is why I'm so... useless."

LABEL: 0x5EC2
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5ED0
STRING: "Because I'm insecure, because I have low self-esteem, I can't even smile properly. Really, I'm so dumb..."

LABEL: 0x5FF0
STRING: She muttered a few self-deprecating words that were painful to hear.

LABEL: 0x605B
STRING: I couldn't do anyting but watch Sycoe as she became a shell of her former self.

LABEL: 0x63A6
STRING: In a business hotel room, I was lost in thought.

LABEL: 0x6407
STRING: Mom and Dad.

LABEL: 0x644E
STRING: They both died, leaving me alone. ...They were burnt to death.

LABEL: 0x64CD
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x64DB
STRING: "Haha, you both left me... now you don't need to worry about anything. That's not fair...

LABEL: 0x6552
STRING: I'd leave with them too if I could, but I couldn't do it...

LABEL: 0x65BB
STRING: I had nowhere to go as I had lost my home and had no relatives who would help.

LABEL: 0x6624
STRING: Of course, no relatives would take me in.

LABEL: 0x667B
STRING: My relatives hated me, saying I was a cursed child... Well, it was only natural.

LABEL: 0x66F4
STRING: I have no home, no money, no family... nothing.

LABEL: 0x6751
STRING: The only thing left is...... a huge amount of debt left by Mom and Dad.

LABEL: 0x67B0
STRING: I could probably have chosen not to inherit it.

LABEL: 0x6807
STRING: But I didn't...

LABEL: 0x684E
STRING: I was afraid I would lose my place in the world.

LABEL: 0x68A9
STRING: Without any relatives, only "they" would take care of me.

LABEL: 0x690E
STRING: I was put in the care of the debt collectors...

LABEL: 0x6963
STRING: I inherited the debts of my parents and this body of mine would be used to pay the debts.

LABEL: 0x69E6
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x69F4
STRING: "What's going to happen to me? ...Metarou-kun, I'm scared. Help me..."

LABEL: 0x6A6C
STRING: I'm heading to the city tomorrow.

LABEL: 0x6AB9
STRING: It seems like I will be forced to work at "that place" in that town.

LABEL: 0x6B14
STRING: I haven't been told what kind of job it is yet, but I'm sure it's not a good job. Nightlife entertainment... Cabaret... Sex industry...

LABEL: 0x6B83
STRING: These words, that I felt like I had no connection to, came to mind. ...No matter what the job is, I have no choice but to do it now.

LABEL: 0x6BF0
STRING: I can't escape until I've paid off all my debts...

LABEL: 0x6C57
STRING: The enormous debt the two left behind.

LABEL: 0x6C9C
STRING: Somehow, I thought it was someone else's problem.

LABEL: 0x6CEB
STRING: It never came to mind that I would have to pay it back all on my own...

LABEL: 0x6D50
STRING: I had such a naive idea that Mom and Dad would be responsible for paying it back...

LABEL: 0x6DCD
STRING: I was still just a child...

LABEL: 0x70B9
STRING: Under the deep blue starry sky.

LABEL: 0x70FA
STRING: A woman illuminated by the twinkling stars was talking with a girl.

LABEL: 0x716D
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x717B
STRING: "...What is happiness, anyway?"

LABEL: 0x71E0
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x71EE
STRING: "My family is poor, and I sometimes wished I had more money."

LABEL: 0x7275
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x7283
STRING: "But I feel like it's not just about having lots of money."

LABEL: 0x7308
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x7316
STRING: "Is that really... enough to say I'm happy? Just living a life of luxury...?"

LABEL: 0x739F
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x73AD
STRING: "But I've also heard that when your life is well provided for, you'll feel quite satisfied."

LABEL: 0x7448
STRING: "Fufu. Isn't that up to each person to decide?"

LABEL: 0x74BB
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x74C9
STRING: "Please tell me, I... can't figure it out on my own."

LABEL: 0x754E
STRING: "I'm sorry, I can't tell you about that."

LABEL: 0x75CF
STRING: "Just as others cannot know what is your happiness, you cannot know my happiness."

LABEL: 0x7672
STRING: "The answer lies only within you, my dear."

LABEL: 0x76DD
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x76EB
STRING: "Right. I guess I'll just have to look for it myself..."

LABEL: 0x7766
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x7774
STRING: "But I don't know. What is it I'm looking for? What is it I want?"

LABEL: 0x77F9
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x7807
STRING: "I wonder if one day I'll find it... when I grow up."

LABEL: 0x7894
STRING: "Yes, there's plenty of time. There's no need to rush, dear."

LABEL: 0x7923
STRING: "I've been searching for it too just like you."

LABEL: 0x79AA
STRING: "What is it that fills your heart... with true satisfaction?"

LABEL: 0x7A37
STRING: "I met someone, and at the end of a long journey, I found him."

LABEL: 0x7AB4
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x7AC2
STRING: "So, what was your happiness, Nenene-san?"

LABEL: 0x7C17
STRING: Anemone

LABEL: 0x7C29
STRING: "My happiness is something that is without form."

LABEL: 0x7C96
STRING: Anemone

LABEL: 0x7CA8
STRING: "All this time, it was so close, so close... and I didn't even notice it."

LABEL: 0x7D47
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x7D55
STRING: "The happiness has always been there...?"

LABEL: 0x7DB6
STRING: Anemone

LABEL: 0x7DC8
STRING: "Yes. I'm sure it's the same for you, isn't it?"

LABEL: 0x7F1D
STRING: Anemone

LABEL: 0x7F2F
STRING: "It's always so close to us that we don't realize how important it is."

LABEL: 0x7FAC
STRING: Anemone

LABEL: 0x7FBE
STRING: "You only know how precious it is when you lose it."
